name: Mega Elements – Addons for Elementor
author: kraftplugins

sections.description:
Mega Elements is a powerful and advanced all in one Elementor addons that help you to create a beautiful website with ease. It offers many customizations and unique styling options to enhance the look and feel of every element on your website.

Build a sturdy and beautiful website with Mega Elements in less time without any coding skills.

Check the Demo.

23+ HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE WIDGETS

  • Accordion – Add beautiful accordions in your posts and pages.
  • Blockquotey – Add your favorite quote with unique styling.
  • Blog – Display your articles anywhere on your site using advanced customization options.
  • Button – Insert button and configure it as per your preference.
  • Call to Action – Display Call to Action across your site to encourage your visitors to take an action.
  • Category – Feature your blog post categories with the post count.
  • Checklist – Easily create a checklist to share on your site.
  • Client Logo – Showcase the website you have been featured on or clients you have worked with.
  • Contact Form 7 – Get full customization control of your contact form.
  • Countdown – Display the countdown timer to grab your visitors’ attention.
  • Counter – Showcase your important statistics or data.
  • Dual Heading – Customize your headings with different color and fonts.
  • BlossomThemes Email Newsletter – Seamlessly integrate the email newsletter to grow your subscribers.
  • Feature List -Display a piece of information with an icon, title, and short description.
  • Featured Page – Easily display your page with featured image and content with a beautiful design.
  • Info Box Grid – List the different services that you offer to your customers.
  • Team – Introduce your awesome team members elegantly.
  • Team_Carousel – Display all your team members at once using different carousel layouts.
  • Testimonial – Share what your clients are saying about you and your brand.
  • Testimonial_Carousel – Choose from different layouts to display your clients testimonials.
  • Pricing_Table – Easily add a pricing table on your site.
  • Price_Menu – Make a beautiful pricing menu for your products.
  • Tabs – Add tabs to elegantly display different information.

Images
sections.installation:
For documentation, go to our Documentation.
If you have any questions or face any issues, reach out to our support team.= Uploading in WordPress Dashboard =

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select mega-elements-addons-for-elementor.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download mega-elements-addons-for-elementor.zip
  2. Extract the mega-elements-addons-for-elementor directory to your computer
  3. Upload the mega-elements-addons-for-elementor directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.changelog:
=1.2.6=
Released on: 2024-09-10
Fix: Warning shown for read more button of Blog widget has been fixed.

=1.2.5=
Released on: 2024-08-20
Fix: XSS Vulnerability has been fixed for Testimonial Caoursel widget, Clients Widget and Tean Caoursel widget.
Update: Added compatibility with Swiper 8.
Update: Removed dependency on Elementor Waypoint library.

=1.2.4=
Released on: 2024-07-30
* Compatibility update.

=1.2.3=
Released on: 2024-06-17
Update: Code refinements in the Advanced Testimonial widget to avoid security vulnerability.

=1.2.2=
Released on: 2024-05-13
Update: Code refinements in the Button widget have been done to avoid security vulnerability.

=1.2.1=
Released on: 2024-04-15
Fixes: Minor styling issues have been fixed.

=1.2.0=
Released on: 2024-03-14
Update: Code refinements have been done to avoid security vulnerability.

=1.1.9=
Released on: 2023-06-22
New: Added new layout to Timleine widget.
New: Added new settings for Post Module widget.
Fix: Minor design refinments for Advanced Testimonial widget has been done.

=1.1.8=
Released on: 2023-04-17
– New: Added three new widgets, namely Post Carousel, Image Card and Advanced Testimonial.

=1.1.7=
Released on: 2023-04-10
– New: Added additional heading tag settings for the Timeline widget

=1.1.6=
Released on: 2023-04-10
– Fix: Image size for Product Category Tab widget
– Fix: Design issue of user avatar in Blog widget
– New: Added two new widgets namely, Post Modules and Timeline
– New: Added a new layout (fifth) to the Blog widget
– Update: Removed Owl Carousel Library and replaced the sliders with Swiper JS library

=1.1.5=
Released on: 2023-02-07
– Fix: Elementor deprecated warning has been fixed

=1.1.4=
Released on: 2022-12-12
– Update: Added Elementor compatiblity tag in Elementor tested upto for plugin compatiblity.
– Fixes: Minor bug fixed.

=1.1.3=
Released on: 2022-08-31
– Fix: Container issue for newsletter widget
– Fix: Testimonial layout 2 mobile spacing issue
– Minor issue fixes.

=1.1.2 =
Released on: 2022-04-29
– Fix: Design issue fixes for product category, product grid and product category tab.

1.1.1

Released on: 2022-04-15
– Fix: WooCommerce warning fix for product category, product grid and product category tab.

1.1.0

Released on: 2022-04-13
– Added: Image sizes options for blog widget
– Fixes: Design fixes for testimonial, product category and blog widgets

1.0.9

Released on: 2022-04-01
– Fixes: Removed static min-width of countdown widget

1.0.8

Released on: 2022-03-24
– New Feature: Added 3 new product widgets
– Fixes: “_register_controls is deprecated” error

1.0.7

Released on: 2022-01-27
– Enhancement: WordPress 5.9 compatibility update.
– Fixes: Minor Bug Fixes.

1.0.6

Released on: 2021-11-25
– Fixes: Minor Bug Fixes.

1.0.5

Released on: 2021-10-29
– Bug fixes on the Blog Section Icons.
– Fixes: Minor Bug Fixes.

1.0.4

Released on: 2021-10-27
– Fixes: Minor Bug Fixes.

1.0.3

Released on: 2021-09-24
– Fixes: Event widget refinements.

1.0.2

Released on: 2021-09-16
– New Feature: Added events customizable Elementor Widgets.
– Enhancement: SVG icons design changes.
– Fixes: Minor bug fixes on blog widgets.

1.0.1

Released on: 2021-04-22
– New Feature: Added 5 new customizable Elementor Widgets.
– Enhancement: SVG icons design changes.
– Fixes: Minor bug fixes.

1.0.0

  • Initial release
